column4: i have a pretty anoying problem, i was once installing yofrankie (a game), and then i had a blackout.  after the blackout, when i turned my machine back on, when i apt-get install things, it doesnt work!  although, wiredly, i can still install sofware in the software center. (sorry for long post)
balgan: (Reading database ... 156136 files and directories currently installed.)
unable to securely remove '/usr/share/yofrankie-bge/textures/stone_cliff_tile_001_spec.jpg.dpkg-tmp': Input/output error

still doesnt work an error occured while reinstalling

haxxorz321:" sudo apt-get purge -remove yofrankie " should completely uninstall that package if not I am not sure how to get it to remove.
i hate to say this, but guess what?
pose your question again. Someone else here will know more. explain what you already tried.
